page.title: 12Carnival work
page.content: Cromford Carnival has been going on quite a long time but was restarted and improved on in 1977 Jubilee year. The organiser has to go to a lot of trouble getting licenses for things like Collecting Boxes,Raffle,and extensions for pubs.Keys Estates give permission to use the Meadows.To get the Actors and Actresses to come to Cromford is quite a lot of trouble too.Last year the carnival had to pay Â£200 for somebody from Coronation Street to come.The committee have to get permission for the roads so that no cars are allowed through while the parade is going on.The police patrol leads and follow the procession so that no lorries run away.Many years ago a lorry ran away from the procession and killed three little girls that is why it is so important for a police patrol.
